summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and AT&T's Court Appearance Team regarding a subpoena for a records custodian to testify at a trial starting November 29, 2021, related to AT&T file #227815.001 and an affidavit for purged records.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting AT&T to identify a records custodian to testify at a trial starting November 29, 2021, and referencing a trial subpoena.

events.title: Trial start date
events.description: A trial is scheduled to start on November 29, 2021, for which the prosecution is seeking a records custodian from AT&T to testify.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is email correspondence regarding a subpoena for AT&T records custodian testimony.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in a trial starting November 29, 2021.
The case involves AT&T file #227815.001 and an 'Affidavit for purged records'.
The AT&T Court Appearance Team is coordinating witness identification and travel for the trial.
